title: Houseki no Kuni (TV) (Land of the Lustrous)
synopsis: In the mysterious future, crystalline organisms called Gems inhabit a world that has been destroyed by six meteors. Each Gem is assigned a role in order to fight against the Lunarians, a species who attacks them in order to shatter their bodies and use them as decorations.
voices: ['Kurosawa, Tomoyo', 'Ise, Mariya', 'Kayano, Ai', 'Komatsu, Mikako', 'Park, Romi', 'Sakura, Ayane', 'Uchiyama, Yumi', 'Minagawa, Junko', 'Kugimiya, Rie', 'Nakata, Jouji']
staff: [['Kyougoku, Takahiko', ['Director']], ['Nagasaki, Yukio', ['Sound Director']], ['Kuno, Yoko', ['Episode Director', ' Storyboard', ' Key Animation']], ['Matsumi, Shinichi', ['Episode Director', ' Assistant Director', ' Series Production Director']]]
